Literature.Title: Neutralizing Effect of Synthetic Peptides toward SARS-CoV-2.
Literature.Author: Souza PFN, vanTilburg MF, Mesquita FP, Amaral JL, Lima LB, Montenegro RC, Lopes FES, Martins RX, Vieira L, Farias DF, Monteiro-Moreira ACO, Freitas CDT, Bezerra AS, Guedes MIF, Castelo-Branco DSCM, Oliveira JTA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=280 µM,Zebrafish embryos:<10% Killing=1000 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC50=280µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC50=>280µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC50=280µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC50=4.4µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC90=17.5µM),Candida tropicalis(MIC50=2.2µM),Candida tropicalis(MIC90=>280µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC50=2.2µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC90=4.4µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC50=4.4µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC90=>280µM),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(80-90% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Trichophyton rubrum(0-10% Inhibition=50µg/ml),SARS-CoV-2(EC50=90µg/ml)
